name: 陳生明　Office Hours
objective: Introduce unit conversion and effective digits, atomic structure of elements, chemical equation balance and calculation, reaction heat, gas and gas law, atmosphere and environmental pollution, periodic table, chemical bonds, molecular structure of compounds, thermodynamics, kinetics, reaction mechanism, balance Constant, oxidation and reduction, acid-base reaction, electrochemistry, separation and separation, and modern scientific and technological materials, have a good chemical foundation.
schedule:
First week: Chemical Foundations & Periodic Table
Second week: Chemical foundations & Periodic Table
Third week: Atoms, Molecules, and Ions
Fourth week: Atoms, Molecules, and Ions & Stoichiometry
Fifth week: Stoichiometry
Sixth week: Types of Chemical Reaction and Solution Stoichiometry
Seventh week: Types of Chemical Reaction and Solution Stoichiometry & Gas
Eighth week: Gas
Ninth week: Midterm exam
Tenth week  Thermochemistry
Eleventh week: Thermochemistry & Atomic Structure and Periodicty
Twelfth week: Atomic Structure and Periodicity
Thirteenth week: Bonding: General Concepts
Fourteenth week: Bonding: General Concepts & Covalent Bonding: Orbitals
Fifteenth week: Covalent Bonding: Orbitals
Sixteenth week: Liquids and solids
Seventeenth week: Liquids and solids
Eighteenth week: Final exam
scorePolicy:
Mid-term exam 30%
Final exam 30%
Quiz, homework, and report 30%
Attendance 10%
